elements.name: question2
elements.title: What is an access point? Where is it used?
elements.correctAnswer: A station (device) with a WLAN transmitter for the wireless connection of devices.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Why do you need an IP address?

elements.name: question5
elements.title: What is a router? Do you even need one?
elements.correctAnswer: Yes, you need it, it establishes the connection to the Internet (to the Internet service provider).

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Describe the difference between a proxy server and a firewall.
elements.correctAnswer: Proxy: Protection from the inside to the outside, restrictions on what can be searched for on the Internet. Firewall: Protection from the outside in, restrictions on what can be "delivered" to the company network.
